metadata.tagline: Get stronger, faster, and more agile. Smash your personal bests
metadata.purpose: Detailed visual dashboard with FULL scripts and guidance

approaches.script: [See full word track for COLD APPROACH script]
[See full word track for WARM INTRO script]
[See full word track for SOCIAL MEDIA DM script]
[See full word track for REFERRAL script]

questions.question: How would you describe your typical day and energy levels?
What does feeling your best look like for you?
When do you typically experience challenges with this?
On a scale of 1-10, how much does this impact your daily life?
What frustrates you most about your current situation?
What activities are you holding back on because of this?
How does this affect your mood, relationships, or work?
If this was solved tomorrow, what would you do first?
What have you tried before and what worked or didn't?
What's most important to you - speed, natural, or ease of use?

content.problem: Many people struggle with athletic performance challenges - feeling frustrated by temporary solutions that don't address the root cause.
content.agitate: This isn't just a minor inconvenience - it impacts your productivity, relationships, mood, and overall quality of life. The costs add up over time.
content.solve: That's why Victory uses Vibrotactile Technology - specialized patterns that work with your body's natural neural responses. Drug-free, non-invasive, effective.

objections.response: I understand cost is important. What other criteria matter most to you beyond price?
Of course! What specific questions would help you make this decision?
Great idea! What concerns might they have that we could address now?
I understand the skepticism. What would you need to see or experience to feel confident?
What did you like or dislike about those solutions? What was missing?
That's fine. What specifically doesn't align with what you're looking for?
If you could solve this challenge easily, how would that help your time and energy?
What appeals to you about that option? (Then explain VTT difference)

6_closing.title: 🏆 5 CLOSING TECHNIQUES
6_closing.pre_close: Always ask: 'Do you have any questions?' + 'Does this make sense?'

techniques.name: ASSUMPTIVE
techniques.script: Great! Victory is exactly what you need. What's the best shipping address for your order?

techniques.name: ALTERNATIVE
techniques.script: Would you prefer the 30-day supply, or the 90-day pack for better value?

techniques.name: URGENCY
techniques.script: We have a special promotion ending this week. Want to lock that in today?
techniques.when: They're hesitating, need reason to act

techniques.name: SUMMARY
techniques.script: So you want [goal], drug-free, easy to use. Victory does exactly that. Ready?

techniques.name: REFERRAL
techniques.script: Who else do you know dealing with similar challenges who could benefit?

7_followup.title: 📅 FOLLOW-UP SEQUENCE
7_followup.goal: Build relationship → Get testimonials → Generate referrals

sequence.template: Great connecting! Here's a quick guide to get the most from your patch. Let me know if questions pop up!
How are you feeling with your patches? Noticed any difference yet? I'd love to hear!
One week in! Are you feeling the benefits? Would you be open to sharing your experience?
Hope you're loving the results! Time to reorder soon. Who else might benefit from this?
